summary: This bill, the "Tax Cut for Striking Workers Act of 2025," amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude strike benefits from gross income. It defines "qualified strike benefits" as compensation from a labor organization to a member replacing lost wages during a strike, lockout, or work stoppage. The bill also makes related amendments to the earned income tax credit and the table of contents and applies to compensation received after December 31, 2025.
